description:
Elevate your winter experience with these cutting-edge heating socks, the ultimate solution for cold feet. These aren't your average socks; they harness the power of KOMBI WARM-UP adjustable heating technology, seamlessly integrated with a USB battery pack that keeps you warm for up to 8 hours. Say goodbye to chilly toes, and embrace total warmth and comfort.

  • Three heat levels ensure your feet stay cozy, no matter how cold it gets
  • Designed to withstand the toughest winter conditions, these socks come with extra support on the arch and ankle, as well as reinforced heels and toes
  • With a blend of 25% merino wool, these socks not only keep you warm but also offer natural antimicrobial properties
name: Kombi USB Warm It Up Socks - Unisex
